mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci AND ur.user_type = #{userType} AND r.status = 1 ORDER BY r.sort_order ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_role WHERE role_code = #{roleCode} AND status = 1 LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM sys_role WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY sort_order ASC, created_at ASC
